translation: "In the past, Samantabhadra Bodhidharmajñānātapiṇḍa-saṃvara(btn), who observes the self-nature of the Dharma realm as it is or explains it in three turns with true and real words, will see the Dharma body abiding, undefiled like space, and supported by the authority of the seal of true words, in order to make him resolute, observe his own adamantine body, and form the seal of adamantine wisdom, which correctly observes the hands facing each other, the earth, water, fire, and wind wheels, the left and right, and the two voids each rotating together in the palm of his hand. This is called the Dharma wheel, the most excellent and auspicious seal. This person will soon be among those who save the world, and the authority of the seal of true words will be seen by those who achieve it, always turning the great Dharma wheel, the adamantine sattva wheel, as it really is.

source_sentence: 歸命(一)訶訶訶素怛弩娑嚩(二合)賀(引)　佛子應諦聽　　次東第三院　施願金剛檀　　四方相圴普　衛以金剛印　　當於彼中作　火生漫荼羅　　內心復安置　妙善青蓮印　　智者漫殊音　本真言圍之　　如法布種子　而以為種子　　復於其四旁　嚴飾以青蓮　　圍作勤尊眾第八會　先安妙吉祥　　其身欝金色　五髻冠其頂　　猶如童子形　左持青蓮花　　上表金剛印　慈顏遍微咲　　坐於白蓮花　妙相圓普光　　周匝互暉映　而住佛加持　　神力三昧王　惹野尾惹野　　噇母嚕爾多　北光網菩薩　　阿波羅爾多　次寶觀菩薩　　無垢光菩薩　月光明菩薩　　五髻文殊等　烏波髻告儞　　奉教諸菩薩　文殊二使者　　釣召四奉教　并釣召菩薩　　右光網菩薩　執持眾寶網　　種種妙瓔珞　住寶蓮花座　　而觀佛長子　定拳執釣印　　寶冠持寶印　左蓮無垢光　　青蓮而未敷　前印舒微屈　　計設儞持刀　惠拳地水竪　　質怛羅童子　右拳風輪杖　　召請風為釣　次五種奉教　　不思議童子　定惠內縛拳　　空風竪相合　風屈第三節　　如是五使者　二眾共圍繞　　侍衛無勝智　(文殊三補吒掌二火反押二水背風捻空輪無勝智者文殊也)文殊師利菩薩(滿祖室哩沒駄曩)真言曰。
translation: "Assigning life (1) to the buddhas, listen closely, and then in the third eastern court, venerate the vajradhātu, guard it with the vajra seal, spread it in all directions, create a fire-generating maṇḍala, and then place within it the marvelous blue lotus seal, the Manjush sound of the Wise One, whose true teaching is to spread the seeds according to the teaching and make them seeds.
